channel.title: [317] Serenthia. Oldschool Perfection, Custom home, Custom minigames
channel.description:
New minigame: Chicken Wars: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oFYksT1bVl4
ZOMBIE HORDE: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GOG3bj0-2hI]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GOG3bj0-2hI[/url]
[SIZE=4]Serenthia is a PvP based server 317 revision (with 568 models).
Why Serenthia? We think you should choose Serenthia out of all the other server's for 3 reasons: 24/7 Hosting (100% uptime), Fun friendly environment and we are growing in fantastic features, fast!
Latest:
[ul][*]Chicken Wars. [*]New custom home area. [*]Helper NPCs and interfaces. [*]Added MySQL Implementation; Online players list, Highscore, Personal highscore(profile), Killscore(PvP and PvE). [*]Lots added to Zombie Horde, new waves, zombies do damage and have drops, points, shop, winners. [*]Changed home area entirely & added 3 new thieving stalls.[/ul]
How to play: Just go to [URL=http://"http://serenthia.co.uk/help.php"]the website[/URL] and press play now to download the JAR file (Please note you need to install the latest version of Java to play!)
[LEFT] Features include: Custom minigames! Custom home area with portals to area's. MySQL Highscore & website implementation. 24/7 Host. PvP everywhere, with select safe areas. World Random Events. Zombie Horde Event. (Forces players to work as a team)(Comes every half an hour) Perfect Combat & including magic and range in its entirety Bosses Mini-games Lots of great shops Skilling (All Skills work) (Safe area's to train combat and skills) Lag free and fast host. Many many more.
[/LEFT] [URL=http://"http://serenthia.co.uk/clients/client002.jar"]Download[/URL] client and this will automatically download the cache.
Future updates: [LEFT] [ul][*]Spawners & Earners [*]Mountable NPC's [*]Unique Quest's [*]Expand worldevent [*]Add random events for players.[/ul]
[/LEFT]
JUST IN: [LEFT] Website previews: [SPOILER=MySQL][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/k9iyxu4h5peky81/databasing.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/2i3klj75dkz57e2/highscoreova.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/apqpw72i49disg3/highscorestr.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/mhdeuos8x5pwpbx/personalscores.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/67o6rhwr39zzt78/pvpzhs.png?dl=0[/img][/SPOILER] [/LEFT]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/s4rg80um3u6wd5w/customhome1.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/pnvbkid8hw2xkvo/customhome2.png?dl=0[/img]
[SPOILER=Newer images] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/17rjp56tow6lt76/cw1.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/r9xni0wrg3p76x7/ZombieHorde101.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/8fyhckslnchgadk/portals.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/uozhqybhm31mvxx/thieving.png?dl=0[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Basic Features Gallery]Perfect combat :D [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img913/7410/V3hsT8.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
Any comments are greatly appreciated. :)
[LEFT] Once you start you will see shops and portals all around as well as area's to train skills and gain money. Please support by voting on [url=http://www.serenthia.co.uk/]Serenthia[/url]
- Senior. [/LEFT] [/center] [/SIZE]

item.title: [317] Serenthia. Oldschool Perfection, Custom home, Custom minigames
item.dc:creator: @Sam_Server1 Sam_Server
item.description:
@Sam_Server1 wrote:

New minigame: Chicken Wars:

ZOMBIE HORDE:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GOG3bj0-2hI

[SIZE=4]Serenthia is a PvP based server 317 revision (with 568 models).

Why Serenthia?
We think you should choose Serenthia out of all the other server’s for 3 reasons:
24/7 Hosting (100% uptime), Fun friendly environment and we are growing in fantastic features, fast!

Latest:

[ul][]Chicken Wars.
[]New custom home area.
[]Helper NPCs and interfaces.
[]Added MySQL Implementation; Online players list, Highscore, Personal highscore(profile), Killscore(PvP and PvE).
[]Lots added to Zombie Horde, new waves, zombies do damage and have drops, points, shop, winners.
[]Changed home area entirely & added 3 new thieving stalls.[/ul]

How to play:
Just go to the website and press play now to download the JAR file (Please note you need to install the latest version of Java to play!)

[LEFT]
Features include:
Custom minigames!
Custom home area with portals to area’s.
MySQL Highscore & website implementation.
24/7 Host.
PvP everywhere, with select safe areas.
World Random Events.
Zombie Horde Event. (Forces players to work as a team)(Comes every half an hour)
Perfect Combat & including magic and range in its entirety
Bosses
Mini-games
Lots of great shops
Skilling (All Skills work) (Safe area’s to train combat and skills)
Lag free and fast host.
Many many more.

[/LEFT]
Download client and this will automatically download the cache.

Future updates:
[LEFT]
[ul][]Spawners & Earners
[]Mountable NPC’s
[]Unique Quest’s
[]Expand worldevent
[*]Add random events for players.[/ul]
